channel.title: Project uniQue
channel.description:
[COLOR=green][CENTER] [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/2rrrj2t.jpg[/img] [SIZE=20pt][COLOR=Green]Uni[/COLOR][COLOR=Red]Q[/COLOR][COLOR=green]ue[/COLOR][/SIZE]
[CENTER][size=20pt]Information:[/size][/CENTER] UniQue is a server that was developed by Skiiii. I was a mod on the Beta from start to finish. I have gotten permission from Skiiii himself to continue the work. I have studied the emulous code and what all he has done so i wont let you all old unique players down. The server aims to captures features of runescape which are not seen in many other servers, and not half-assed jobs of them either. If you are one of those people who are like omg customs ruin teh server this server is not for you. This server does include: Vesta's Longsword, Statius Hammer, Galkon's Godbows, Dragon Claws, Dragon platebody and many other newer runescape items.
The idea of this server is also to make people work to achieve things. This doesn't mean its anywhere near as slow as runescape however. The exp rate will still be determined, b/c as before 30X was boring to some people? Items are also hard to obtain to keep a decent economy. Most items are obtained through slayer monster drops, monster drops, minigames and skills. Certain Pking items will have to be obtained through Lucifer and The fully working, with magic and melee, chaos elemental.
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Quests:[/CENTER]
[COLOR=Red]Recipe for disaster:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Yellow]70%[/COLOR] - Some mini quests are not completed. - Examine each of the npcs in the banquet room to find out how to free them. - Slightly customized from runescape, but still captures the same ideas - e.g. Diving for pirate pete's, use of a hellcat for Evil Dave's etc... - The chest gets increased access as you complete each miniquest.
[COLOR=Red]Mage Arena:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Kill all the forms of kolodian to unlock the god capes and staffs. - Pretty accurate dialogues.
[COLOR=Red]Recruitment Drive:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Not 100% to runescape, custom quest with the same reward and another bonus, ability to buy initiate and a holy symbol which rewards double prayer exp whilst wearing and burying bones.
[COLOR=Red]Dark Magician:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - 100% custom quest, allows players to unlock the warrior spellbook.
[COLOR=Red]Lost City:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]85%[/COLOR] - Allows you to war DDS, and dragon long. - Dialogue similar to RS.
[COLOR=Red]Death Plateau:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Yellow]80%[/COLOR] - Short quest added for the purpose of buying climbing boots.
[COLOR=Red]Warrior's Challenge:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - 100% custom quest, allows player to use piety and chivelary spells.
[COLOR=Red]Monkey Madness:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]85%[/COLOR] - Pretty similar ideas to runescape. - 100% working sliding puzzle, can not skip... ([url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=bfot3t&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=bfot3t&s=5[/url]) - Full jungle demon fight. - Working cutscene of being shot and sent to jail if not wielding a monkey greegree. - Pretty similar to runescape, shorter however.
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Combat:[/CENTER]
[COLOR=Red]Melee:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]90%[/COLOR] - Special attacks on each special weapon. - Max hit and defence calculations nearly perfect. - Combos work pretty flawlessly - including magic/melee and range/melee combos, such as bow to maul or blitz from a distance to dds.
[COLOR=Red]Range:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]98%[/COLOR] - All range weapons work, including thrown items such as knives, darts and chinchompas. - Weapon specials work, including dark bow, as well as rune thrownaxe which works 100% and bounces off upto 3 npcs in the area and causing damage - correct projectiles and animations. - Projectiles and delayed hits. - Correctly timed hits on things like darts and knives.
[COLOR=Red]Magic:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]90%[/COLOR] - 100% combat spells work, including full autocasting. - Correct rune amounts and levels needed for each spell. - Lunar spellbook is still in development, but vengeance works and a custom warrior spellbook which works 100%.
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Skills:[/CENTER]
[IMG]http://i35.tinypic.com/30wmvch.gif[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]99%[/COLOR] - All rocks work. - Level of pickaxe goes into account. - Rocks run out of ore. - just gotta go back over for bugs.
[IMG]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:Ub831w25guboNM:http://i256.photobucket.com/albums/hh161/DEZARAYD/85%2520blog%2520pic/smithing_icon.gif[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Levels are all correct with smith able items. - Smith bars interface with X, 10, 5, 1. - Full interface with correct everything on smelting.
[IMG]http://t1.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:540JYoDFGN939M:http://i256.photobucket.com/albums/hh161/DEZARAYD/85%2520blog%2520pic/firemaking_icon.gif[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Full burning. - Interfaces all used.
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/2hs2446_th.jpg[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Fishing spots all in the correct places. - Correct calculations on random catches. - All spots use the correct item needed.
[IMG]http://s5.tinypic.com/kf4lqr_th.jpg[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR] - Have to ID herbs. - Correct levels to ID unids. - All potions are make able. - Correct levels for each potion.
[IMG]http://t3.gstatic.com/images?q=tbn:INu332M1CCb9FM:http://www.runescape-tip.com/app/icons/slayer.png[/img]- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Talk to slayer master for task. - Required items to kill different monsters. - Enchanted gem shows your progress. - Slayer tower is full of slayer monsters.
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Minigames:[/CENTER]
[COLOR=Red]Lucifer:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Uses Vengeance and Barrage. - Eats and heals. - Hits through prayer.
[URL=http://nl.tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=S5MGK0aCs7w9Ngt8eM%2FzyYh4l5k2TGxc]Lucifer![/URL]
[COLOR=Red]Chaos Ele:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Uses tele and magic. - Hits through prayer.
[COLOR=Red]Clue Scrolls:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR] - Uses hints, clues, maps, and sextant coords. - Few bugs need to be worked out.
[COLOR=Red]Pest Control:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - NPCs attack void. - Aggressive NPCs spawn and attack you. - Full interface used. - First to have original interface and void being attacked. - 50 damage needed to get points. - EXP exchange and item exchange. - Waiting boat. - Better than most RSPS versions of pest control by far.
[COLOR=Red]Barrows:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR] - Coffins spawn the NPC. - Headicon hints for your NPC. - Random tunnel. - All NPCs have their effects. - Must kill all barrows brothers before opening chest. - Fair random drop, including barrows and dragon items as well as runes, arrows etc...
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/zvpflz.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=Red]Magic Training Arena:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Never seen any other server with this working 100%. - All correct interfaces whilst in game. - All 4 minigames work pretty much perfect to RS, including the telekinetic mazes completed and working 100%. - Full rewards with same prices as Runescape, however pizazz points are earned 10x faster.
[url=http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=msdmds&s=5]http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=msdmds&s=5[/url]
[COLOR=Red]Death Pits:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Works just like fight pits. - Waiting room with countdown. - Bonus points given to 1st, 2nd, and third. - For every 50 damage dealt, you get a point. - For every kill you get, you get a point. - Points are exchanged for items and exp.http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=S5MGK0aCs7yo1VlOWowCj4h4l5k2TGxc]http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=...wCj4h4l5k2TGxc[/url]
[COLOR=Red]Party Room:[/COLOR][COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] [code] First of its- kind! Chest opens interface. Created a new PartyRoom class. Created two ArrayLists, preList and dropList which contain the items you are adding to the chest, and the items in the chest. ArrayLists hold Object PartyItem which holds the Item ID and amount. Added fully working deposit, adds the item to the correct ArrayList, all deposit options work, items display on the interface. Added fully working Accept button. All items held on preList arraylist (items waiting to be added) are added to the chest when the button is clicked (irreversable). Added fully working withdraw options, all options work, items re-arrange on the interface. Bug fixes: Cannot withdraw or deposit more than available, stackable and non-stackable item support added. Working lever implemented, requires 1k to pull and can not be pulled if there are no items in the chest. Balloons implemented, once the lever is pulled several balloons appear for all players in the area, if you teleport to the area the objects update and appear for you too. Prize system implemented, all items from the chest are placed into an array and there is a random chance of obtaining them from the balloons. Stackable items are now split into several balloons containing a random amount (with a maximum of 10 different balloons with one type of item) None-stackable items are spread into an amount of balloons equal to the amount of the item in the chest, one per balloon. All balloon objects disappear once the party has ended.[/code] Vid: [URL=http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jcob7pw-W2I]http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jcob7pw-W2I[/URL]
Range Guild: [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR] - Ticket exchange store. - Armor and arrow stores. - Full target game, accuracy depends on range level, receive tickets and range experience for playing.
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/16bd6hg.jpg[/img]
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Features List[/CENTER]
* Full 317 runescape map, access to everywhere including members side of map * Lots of working minigames with great rewards to encourage more to play. * Fully working bosses with good drops, actually difficult to defeat. * Fully working party room drop parties, including depositing items into chest, pulling lever and popping balloons... near enough perfect. * Personal shops system which allows players to open their own shop for a price, depending on the shop type. Players can visit each others shops by searching or by right clicking visit shop. * Full custom spell book with great effects to aid warriors in pking. * Fantastic PvP system with full multi and single areas in wild. * 8 Quests, and one with 6 mini quests within. * Great economy and fun server to play.
[COLOR=Red][CENTER][SIZE=5]Credits:[/SIZE] Skiiii (Adam)
[U]Support Banner: [IMG]http://i41.tinypic.com/neht6v.gif[/img]
[Code]http://i41.tinypic.com/neht6v.gif[/code]
[U][COLOR=Red][U]Spots:[/U][/COLOR] [B]Mods (2) : Scape-Java Graphic Designer [/B]
Contact me: [email]wowaddictkid505@msn.com[/email] to apply [/CENTER]

item.title: Project uniQue
item.dc:creator: @willbill1 willbill1
item.description:
@willbill1 wrote:

[COLOR=green][CENTER]

[SIZE=20pt][COLOR=Green]Uni[/COLOR][COLOR=Red]Q[/COLOR][COLOR=green]ue[/COLOR][/SIZE]

[CENTER][size=20pt]Information:[/size][/CENTER]
UniQue is a server that was developed by Skiiii. I was a mod on the Beta from start to finish. I have gotten permission from Skiiii himself to continue the work. I have studied the emulous code and what all he has done so i wont let you all old unique players down. The server aims to captures features of runescape which are not seen in many other servers, and not half-assed jobs of them either. If you are one of those people who are like omg customs ruin teh server this server is not for you. This server does include: Vesta’s Longsword, Statius Hammer, Galkon’s Godbows, Dragon Claws, Dragon platebody and many other newer runescape items.

The idea of this server is also to make people work to achieve things. This doesn’t mean its anywhere near as slow as runescape however. The exp rate will still be determined, b/c as before 30X was boring to some people? Items are also hard to obtain to keep a decent economy. Most items are obtained through slayer monster drops, monster drops, minigames and skills. Certain Pking items will have to be obtained through Lucifer and The fully working, with magic and melee, chaos elemental.

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Quests:[/CENTER]

[COLOR=Red]Recipe for disaster:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Yellow]70%[/COLOR]

  • Some mini quests are not completed.
  • Examine each of the npcs in the banquet room to find out how to free them.
  • Slightly customized from runescape, but still captures the same ideas - e.g. Diving for pirate pete’s, use of a hellcat for Evil Dave’s etc…
  • The chest gets increased access as you complete each miniquest.

[COLOR=Red]Mage Arena:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Kill all the forms of kolodian to unlock the god capes and staffs.
  • Pretty accurate dialogues.

[COLOR=Red]Recruitment Drive:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Not 100% to runescape, custom quest with the same reward and another bonus, ability to buy initiate and a holy symbol which rewards double prayer exp whilst wearing and burying bones.

[COLOR=Red]Dark Magician:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • 100% custom quest, allows players to unlock the warrior spellbook.

[COLOR=Red]Lost City:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]85%[/COLOR]

  • Allows you to war DDS, and dragon long.
  • Dialogue similar to RS.

[COLOR=Red]Death Plateau:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Yellow]80%[/COLOR]

  • Short quest added for the purpose of buying climbing boots.

[COLOR=Red]Warrior’s Challenge:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • 100% custom quest, allows player to use piety and chivelary spells.

[COLOR=Red]Monkey Madness:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]85%[/COLOR]

  • Pretty similar ideas to runescape.
  • 100% working sliding puzzle, can not skip… (http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=bfot3t&s=5)
  • Full jungle demon fight.
  • Working cutscene of being shot and sent to jail if not wielding a monkey greegree.
  • Pretty similar to runescape, shorter however.

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Combat:[/CENTER]

[COLOR=Red]Melee:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]90%[/COLOR]

  • Special attacks on each special weapon.
  • Max hit and defence calculations nearly perfect.
  • Combos work pretty flawlessly - including magic/melee and range/melee combos, such as bow to maul or blitz from a distance to dds.

[COLOR=Red]Range:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]98%[/COLOR]

  • All range weapons work, including thrown items such as knives, darts and chinchompas.
  • Weapon specials work, including dark bow, as well as rune thrownaxe which works 100% and bounces off upto 3 npcs in the area and causing damage - correct projectiles and animations.
  • Projectiles and delayed hits.
  • Correctly timed hits on things like darts and knives.

[COLOR=Red]Magic:[/COLOR] - [COLOR=Lime]90%[/COLOR]

  • 100% combat spells work, including full autocasting.
  • Correct rune amounts and levels needed for each spell.
  • Lunar spellbook is still in development, but vengeance works and a custom warrior spellbook which works 100%.

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Skills:[/CENTER]

- [COLOR=Lime]99%[/COLOR]

  • All rocks work.
  • Level of pickaxe goes into account.
  • Rocks run out of ore.
  • just gotta go back over for bugs.

- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Levels are all correct with smith able items.
  • Smith bars interface with X, 10, 5, 1.
  • Full interface with correct everything on smelting.

- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Full burning.
  • Interfaces all used.

- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Fishing spots all in the correct places.
  • Correct calculations on random catches.
  • All spots use the correct item needed.

- [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR]

  • Have to ID herbs.
  • Correct levels to ID unids.
  • All potions are make able.
  • Correct levels for each potion.

- [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Talk to slayer master for task.
  • Required items to kill different monsters.
  • Enchanted gem shows your progress.
  • Slayer tower is full of slayer monsters.

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Minigames:[/CENTER]

[COLOR=Red]Lucifer:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Uses Vengeance and Barrage.
  • Eats and heals.
  • Hits through prayer.

Lucifer!

[COLOR=Red]Chaos Ele:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Uses tele and magic.
  • Hits through prayer.

[COLOR=Red]Clue Scrolls:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR]

  • Uses hints, clues, maps, and sextant coords.
  • Few bugs need to be worked out.

[COLOR=Red]Pest Control:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • NPCs attack void.
  • Aggressive NPCs spawn and attack you.
  • Full interface used.
  • First to have original interface and void being attacked.
  • 50 damage needed to get points.
  • EXP exchange and item exchange.
  • Waiting boat.
  • Better than most RSPS versions of pest control by far.

[COLOR=Red]Barrows:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]95%[/COLOR]

  • Coffins spawn the NPC.
  • Headicon hints for your NPC.
  • Random tunnel.
  • All NPCs have their effects.
  • Must kill all barrows brothers before opening chest.
  • Fair random drop, including barrows and dragon items as well as runes, arrows etc…

[COLOR=Red]Magic Training Arena:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Never seen any other server with this working 100%.
  • All correct interfaces whilst in game.
  • All 4 minigames work pretty much perfect to RS, including the telekinetic mazes completed and working 100%.
  • Full rewards with same prices as Runescape, however pizazz points are earned 10x faster.

http://tinypic.com/player.php?v=msdmds&s=5

[COLOR=Red]Death Pits:[/COLOR] [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Works just like fight pits.
  • Waiting room with countdown.
  • Bonus points given to 1st, 2nd, and third.
  • For every 50 damage dealt, you get a point.
  • For every kill you get, you get a point.
  • Points are exchanged for items and exp.http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=S5MGK0aCs7yo1VlOWowCj4h4l5k2TGxc]http://tinypic.com/usermedia.php?uo=...wCj4h4l5k2TGxc[/url]

[COLOR=Red]Party Room:[/COLOR][COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

First of its- kind! Chest opens interface. Created a new PartyRoom class. Created two ArrayLists, preList and dropList which contain the items you are adding to the chest, and the items in the chest. ArrayLists hold Object PartyItem which holds the Item ID and amount. Added fully working deposit, adds the item to the correct ArrayList, all deposit options work, items display on the interface. Added fully working Accept button. All items held on preList arraylist (items waiting to be added) are added to the chest when the button is clicked (irreversable). Added fully working withdraw options, all options work, items re-arrange on the interface. Bug fixes: Cannot withdraw or deposit more than available, stackable and non-stackable item support added. Working lever implemented, requires 1k to pull and can not be pulled if there are no items in the chest. Balloons implemented, once the lever is pulled several balloons appear for all players in the area, if you teleport to the area the objects update and appear for you too. Prize system implemented, all items from the chest are placed into an array and there is a random chance of obtaining them from the balloons. Stackable items are now split into several balloons containing a random amount (with a maximum of 10 different balloons with one type of item) None-stackable items are spread into an amount of balloons equal to the amount of the item in the chest, one per balloon. All balloon objects disappear once the party has ended.
Vid: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Jcob7pw-W2I

Range Guild: [COLOR=Lime]100%[/COLOR]

  • Ticket exchange store.
  • Armor and arrow stores.
  • Full target game, accuracy depends on range level, receive tickets and range experience for playing.

16bd6hg.jpg990×500

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][size=20pt]Features List[/CENTER]

* Full 317 runescape map, access to everywhere including members side of map
* Lots of working minigames with great rewards to encourage more to play.
* Fully working bosses with good drops, actually difficult to defeat.
* Fully working party room drop parties, including depositing items into chest, pulling lever and popping balloons... near enough perfect.
* Personal shops system which allows players to open their own shop for a price, depending on the shop type. Players can visit each others shops by searching or by right clicking visit shop.
* Full custom spell book with great effects to aid warriors in pking.
* Fantastic PvP system with full multi and single areas in wild.
* 8 Quests, and one with 6 mini quests within.
* Great economy and fun server to play.

[COLOR=Red][CENTER][SIZE=5]Credits:[/SIZE]
Skiiii (Adam)

[U]Support Banner:

http://i41.tinypic.com/neht6v.gif

[U][COLOR=Red]Spots:[/COLOR]
Mods (2)
: Scape-Java
Graphic Designer

Contact me: wowaddictkid505@msn.com to apply
[/CENTER]

Read full topic
